channel.title: krita on Krita Site
channel.description: Recent content in krita on Krita Site

item.title: First Krita Book in French!
item.description: After Japanese and English, here is the first book for french-speaking people who want to get started using Krita! The author is Timothée Giet, long time user and contributor and the creator of two of acclaimed training DVDs for the Krita Foundation, Comics with Krita and Secrets of Krita.

item.title: Krita 2.9 Animation Edition Beta released!
item.description: Today we are happy to announce the long awaited beta-version of Krita with Animation and Instant Preview support! Based on Krita 2.

item.title: Krita Webshop: New Designs!
item.description: The wait is finally over! We are here with a new set of merchandise designs which features artworks contributed by some of our own artists.
